synopsis.text: Ishida, Noshishi, and their cunning fox friend, Zorori, embark on a magical journey to aid the enigmatic Najo and the skilled wizard Nelly in reviving a mystical forest in an enchanted realm. As they traverse through this fantastical world filled with talking animals, Zorori strives to prove his worth to his late mother by fulfilling his dreams of becoming the ultimate prankster, owning a castle, and finding a beautiful bride. Meanwhile, in the second season, the trio joins Puppe on a thrilling quest to locate the elusive Minus Eel. Prepare for a captivating adventure filled with laughter, camaraderie, and magical exploits in this heartwarming anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
